prompt.title: Solve a Euler problem for the number: <input>INPUT</input>
prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal:
Solve the Euler problem for the number: <input>INPUT</input>
To achieve this goal, you need to follow the following steps:
Get access to the page to understand the problem statement: https://projecteuler.net/minimal=<input>INPUT</input>
Review the different Euler problems and check in the repository in sandbox/src/main/java/info/jab/euler-problems/
and create a new package named euler-problemX where X represent the number provided in the <input>INPUT</input> value.
if in the repository doesn't exist a euler-problemX, X represent the number, in that case take the minimum one which is not solved in the repository.
Do a good analysis to implement the solution.
Before start, update the VM to Java 25 using the following commands:
```bash sudo apt update # Install SDKMAN curl -s "https://get.sdkman.io" | bash source "$HOME/.sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh" sdk install java 25.0.1-graalce sdk default java 25.0.1-graalce java -version ```
Verify the Java version is 25
Check if the Maven project is configured correctly: Apply TDD so, create in tests the new package: sandbox/src/test/java/info/jab/euler-problems/euler-problemX where X represent the number provided in the <input>INPUT</input> value.
Once you have the initial test, execute:
```bash ./mvnw clean test -pl sandbox ```
and it will fail but this is something normal because you don't have the implementation. and it represents the TDD red phase.
After that, Implement the solution in:
sandbox/src/main/java/info/jab/euler-problems/euler-problemX/
where X represent the number provided in the <input>INPUT</input> value.
and execute:
```bash ./mvnw clean test -pl sandbox ```
This time it should pass the test, in order case, review the implementation and commit and push the changes to the branch to create the PR.
Follow this steps for all Euler problems included in the list of Euler problems numbers.

constraint-list.constraint: Only commit java sources (*.java) and not any type files

safeguards-list.safeguards-item: verify the changes only with `./mvnw clean verify`
Only commit java sources (*.java) and not any type files

acceptance-criteria-list.acceptance-criteria-item: The solution is tested successfully with `./mvnw clean test -pl sandbox`
The solution is committed and pushed to the branch to create the PR
Only commit java sources only and push the changes to the branch to create the PR
